title: In-app Purchase_MIAN-465
custom_preconds:
As a product owner, I want users to be able to purchase MiLB.TV for Android on their phone/device.
- Monthly
- Yearly

title: Location Request Prompt_MIAN-528
custom_preconds: Given the user has denied access to location prompt during initial app launch / on-boarding process
custom_steps:
When the user clicks on a MiLB.tv feed for the first time
and is an entitled user
custom_expected:
Then the location requests should be triggered, user will see an allow location request prompt:

"Location required in order to use this application."

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the following prompt:

Allow First Pitch to access this device's location? 
Deny / Allow

title: Side Nav
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the app
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the side nav
custom_expected: Then the MiLB.tv will be available as a standalone page

title: Team Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the app
custom_steps: When the user navigates to any team page
custom_expected: Then the MiLB.tv icon will appear on the top right corner of each team page

title: Orientation
custom_preconds: Given the user navigates to MiLB.tv EPG
custom_steps:
When the user rotates the device to 
-portrait
-landscape
custom_expected: Then the schedules page will display in both orientations

title: MiLB.tv Login_MIAN-537 & MIAN-539
custom_preconds: Given the user Navigates to Settings
custom_steps:
When the user taps on MiLB.tv Account
and has not logged into MiLB.tv
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the MiLB.tv login which contains the following:

custom_steps_separated.expected: Email Field
Password Field
Privacy Policy link which takes user to: http://wap.milb.com/milb/iphone/privacy?ref=@applicationReference@
Forgot Password link

Line of text beneath "privacy policy" & "forgot password" and above the "canel / ok" buttons:

"Click here to subscribe to MiLB.TV to watch more than 5,500 games."

Tappable link takes user to the following: http://www.milb.com/milb/multimedia/
Cancels login process
OK

title: User is Entitled to MiLB.tv_MIAN-537
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled (paid user) to MiLB.tv
custom_steps: When the user attempts to access a live or archive MiLB.tv feed
custom_expected:
Then the following message will display "Please wait while we confirm your account information."
AND
the feed will play

title: User is Not Entitled to MiLB.tv_MIAN-537 & MIAN-550
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled (non paid user) to MiLB.tv
OR
the user is an invalid user
custom_steps: When the user attempts to access a live or archive MiLB.tv feed
custom_expected:
Then the the following messages are displayed which informs the user to buy on the web then login to the app:

"Please wait while we confirm your account information."

followed by

"You are either not logged in or not a MiLB.TV subscriber.
If you are a subscriber, please log in by going to Settings in the slideout navigation and signing into your MiLB.com account.
If you are not a subscriber, please visit http://MiLB.TV to subscribe for access."

title: User is Blackedout to MiLB.tv_MIAN-537 & MIAN-550
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled (paid user) to MiLB.tv
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to access a live MiLB.tv feed
and is Blacked Out
custom_expected:
Then the the following message is displayed:

"We have determined this game is unavailable for live viewing through MiLB.TV in your area."

And the feed will not play.

title: Stream Until Completion_MIAN-596
custom_preconds:
Given the user navigates to MiLB.tv
And is logged in as an entitled MiLB.tv user
custom_steps: When the user accesses a live feed and watches the stream
custom_expected:
Then the stream shall play without interruptions until completion
and device should not go to sleep nor standby mode
and there is No end-slate, user will see the encoding freeze at the point of where the encoder was turned off, about five minutes post-game

title: Player Feed_MIAN-599
custom_preconds:
Given the user navigates to MiLB.tv
And is logged in as an entitled MiLB.tv user
custom_steps: When the user is watching a stream

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed should take up the entire size of the screen
Then the feed should be centered so that both sides would have a black bar rather than a left-justification of the video

title: EPG Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the app
custom_steps: When the user accesses MiLB.tv from the main nav or from a Team Page
custom_expected: Then the user should see be on the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page

title: Games on a Given Date
custom_preconds: Given the user accesses MiLB.tv from the main nav or from a Team Page
custom_steps: When the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page
custom_expected:
Then all scheduled MiLB.tv games for a given day should be viewable, i.e. 

QA:
OLD - http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_03/day_15/milbtvgrid.json
NEW - 

PROD:
OLD - http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_11/milbtvgrid.json
NEW - http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?hydrate=decisions,probablePitcher,broadcasts(all),game(content(all)),linescore(matchup,runners,positions),stats,person,team,flags&date=09/15/2017&sportId=11,12,13,14,15,16

title: Stream Order
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page
custom_steps: When the user views the available MiLB.tv streams
custom_expected:
Then the streams appear in the following order:
- live
- upcoming
- archive
- archive soon

title: Game Metadata
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page
custom_steps: When the user views the MiLB.tv game metadata
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following display for each game:

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Day, Month, Date, Year

i.e. Thursday, Apr, 6, 2017

Away City Team Name @ Home City Team Name

i.e. ROC @ SYR

Then the game status displays the status of live

i.e. LIVE

Then the game status displays the Start Time only (no duration time) and Time Zone

i.e. 1:05 PM ET

custom_steps_separated.content: Games in Preview with Game Status Text
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the preview game status text displays

i.e. PRE-GAME

custom_steps_separated.content: Games in Final State is Archive
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game status displays the status of archive

i.e. ARCHIVE

custom_steps_separated.content: Games in Final State is Archive Coming Soon (when a game is over but the archive is not yet available)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game status displays the status of archive coming soon with grayed out text

i.e. ARCHIVE SOON

title: Live State
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page

Mashup File

QA:
http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_05/milbtvgrid.json
PROD:
http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_12/milbtvgrid.json

If "combined_media_state" = Media_on: show 'Live' link
custom_steps:
When the user views games with live MiLB.tv streams available
And displays white text, 'LIVE'
custom_expected:
Then the link to the live games should be clickable
And user is taken to the corresponding live feed

title: Preview State
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page

Mashup File QA: i.e. http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_05/milbtvgrid.json
Mashup File PROD: i.e. http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_12/milbtvgrid.json

If "combined_media_state" = 

- Media_off: show time in ET
1) If "game_status_ind" = "S", print time in ET
2) Else print whatever the value is in "game_status_text" instead of the time

- Media_dead: show time in ET
1) If "game_status_ind" = "S", print time in ET
2) Else print whatever the value is in "game_status_text" instead of the time

- Media_staging: show time in ET
custom_steps: When the user views MiLB.tv games in either of the following preview states

custom_steps_separated.content:
Time displays as gray text
i.e. 1:30 PM ET
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then these links to the games should NOT be clickable

custom_steps_separated.content:
Game status displays as gray text
i.e. PRE-GAME
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then these links to the games should NOT be clickable

title: Final State_Archive
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page
And logged into MiLB.tv

Mashup file QA: i.e. 
OLD: http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_03/day_24/milbtvgrid.json
NEW: 

Mashup file PROD: i.e.
OLD: http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_11/milbtvgrid.json
NEW: http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?hydrate=decisions,probablePitcher,broadcasts(all),game(content(all)),linescore(matchup,runners,positions),stats,person,team,flags&date=09/15/2017&sportId=11,12,13,14,15,16

If "combined_media_state" = 

- Media_archive: show 'archive' link
- Media_done: show archive with no link
custom_steps: When the user views games with MiLB.tv archived streams in gray text

custom_steps_separated.content:
Archive stream, i.e. ARCHIVE

- milbtvgrid.json: MEDIA_ARCHIVE
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then these archived link to the games should be clickable

custom_steps_separated.content:
Archive Coming Soon, i.e. ARCHIVE SOON

- milbtvgrid.json: MEDIA_DONE
- mediaframework: tvMediaUnKnownError or tvMediaMediaUnavailableError
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then these archived coming soon link to the games should NOT be clickable

title: Switch Dates
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes or clicks back
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to view prior days within a given season

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes or clicks forward
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to view future days within a given season

title: Postponed State in EPG_MIAN-595
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page
And logged into MiLB.tv

Mashup file QA: i.e. http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_05/milbtvgrid.json
Mashup file  PROD: i.e. http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_12/milbtvgrid.json

- Media_off: show live link
1) If "game_status_ind" = "S", print time in ET
2) Else print whatever the value is in "game_status_text" instead of the time

- Media_dead: show time in ET
1) If "game_status_ind" = "S", print time in ET
2) Else print whatever the value is in "game_status_text" instead of the time
custom_steps: When there is a game in postponed state
custom_expected:
Then the MiLB.tv schedules/epg page should display Postponed text grayed out
and should not be tappable
i.e. POSTPONED

title: Suspended or Cancelled State in EPG_MIAN-595
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Schedules/EPG Page
And logged into MiLB.tv

Mashup file QA: i.e. http://qa.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_05/milbtvgrid.json
Mashup file  PROD: i.e. http://www.milb.com/gen/mashup/epg/year_2017/month_04/day_12/milbtvgrid.json

*Note: If a game is in a canceled state we are unable to add media to the game. As far as we are aware, only games in MEDIA_STAGING, MEDIA_ON, or MEDIA_ARCHIVE can have media attached to them
custom_steps: When there is a game in either Cancelled or Suspended state
custom_expected: Then the MiLB.tv schedules/epg page should not display feeds for games in these states

title: Smooth Transition of Media States
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged into MiLB.tv
And the user does not have the app opened
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app, navigates to the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page
And a game is transitioning media states (media_staging, media_on, media_done, media_archive) and/or re-ordering in the EPG (from pre-game to live, from live to archive, etc.)
custom_expected: Then the app should function normally and should not crash

title: Archive Feeds Load Properly
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged into MiLB.tv
AND the user navigates to the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page
custom_steps:
When there are a lot of archive game feeds on that that date (i.e. more than three pages worth of feeds)
And the user attempts to tap on any archive before all feeds fully load
custom_expected:
Then all the feeds should load properly
AND app should function normally and should not crash

title: Double Headers Appear in EPG
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged into MiLB.tv
AND the user navigates to the MiLB.tv Schedules/EPG Page
custom_steps:
When there are doubleheader games scheduled
AND feeds are available for both games
custom_expected: Then both feeds should appears in the EPG in all states (Preview, Live, Archive)

title: Player Controls_MIAN-625
custom_preconds:
Current behavior: only controls are a stop button to go back to the MiLB.TV grid and player controls. We're looking for the following:

During live: A "done" or "Back" text button for the user to go back to the MiLB.TV grid. Stop button can be removed.

During archive: We need a timestamp and a scrubber at the bottom. Also, the stop button should be replaced by a pause/play button.  Something like the attached (see JIRA ticket for attachment) would work, removing the next/rewind buttons.

title: EDIT_Use Baseballe Data API to Support MiLB.TV Grid_MIAN-637
custom_preconds:
The MiLB.TV grid is currently running off a deprecated mashup. It should point to a new endpoint coming from the Baseball Data API.

I will update this ticket when the new endpoint is ready.

title: Login/Register error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to login or register
And we can't reach user service

"bamnetLoginIdentityServiceConnError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Could not reach server. Try again later."

title: Invalid Credentials error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user enters invalid login credentials

"bamnetLoginInvalidLogin" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following: 

"Invalid Email/Password."

title: Email & Password Fields Empty error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user leaves the email and password fields empty

"bamnetLoginEmailPwdEmpty" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Enter Email and Password."

title: Account Being Used in 2+ places error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user has an account that is being used in more than two places

"bamnetLoginSingleSignOnError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Our records indicate that multiple users are currently attempting to use your MiLB.com account. Please contact Customer Service for assistance."

title: Unable to Fulfill Order error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the order failed to fulfill

"bamnetLoginFulfillmentError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the following is displayed: 

"Unable to process request." 

* NOTE: This is only for IAP and shouldn't appear

title: Trial error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user encounters an issues with the trial error

"bamnetLoginFulfillmentExcessiveRedeemError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the following is displayed:

"Unable to complete trial signup. Trials can only be redeemed once."

* NOTE: This shouldn't appear

title: User Name Already Exists error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MiLB.tv login page
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to register with an account that already exists

"bamnetRegistrationDuplicateError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Could not reach server. Try again later."
"An account with this email or nickname already exists."

title: Problem Connecting to User Services error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When there is a problem connecting to user services

"bamnetUnknownError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Unable to process request."

title: Media Service error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When there is a error in media service

"tvMediaMFServiceConnError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"We're sorry. The broadcasters' required blackout checks cannot be performed at this time. Please try again in a few moments."

title: Media Service Checking Account Info error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When there is an issue with media service checking account information

"tvMediaAuthenticateMessage" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Please wait while we confirm account information."

title: Application Cannot Rely on User Location error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When the application cannot rely on the user location

"tvMediaLocationMockSettingError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following: 

"First Pitch is unable to reliably verify your location.  Tap Help below for more information about blackout restrictions."

title: App Having Problems Checking Location error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps: When the application is having problems checking the location
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following:

custom_steps_separated.expected: "First Pitch is unable to reliably verify your location. Tap Help below for more information about blackout restrictions."

"First Pitch is having trouble verifying your location. Make sure your cellular/Wi-Fi service is turned on and your location services are enabled.  Tap Help below for more information about blackout restrictions."

"First Pitch is having trouble verifying your location. Make sure your cellular/Wi-Fi service is turned on and your location services are enabled.  Tap Help below for more information about blackout restrictions."

title: Multiple Users Attempting to Watch with Same Account error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When there are multiple users attempting to watch the video with the same account

"tvMediaMFServiceSignOnRestrictionError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following: 

"Our records indicate that multiple users are currently attempting to watch live video with this account.  If you are not attempting to watch MiLB.TV on another device please contact Customer Service at (866) 644-2687 or email customerservice@website.milb.com.  Tap Help to learn more."

title: Media is Not Available error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When the media is not available

"tvMediaMediaUnavailableError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following: 

"MiLB.TV is currently unavailable for this game."

title: Media is Not Available for Unknown Reason error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is attempting to access a MiLB.tv feed as an entitled (paid) user
custom_steps:
When the media is not available

"tvMediaUnKnownError" in "en"
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following: 

"We're Sorry. We are currently unable to process your request. Please try after some time."

title: Support for HD Video Stream_MIAN-654
custom_preconds:
As a user, I'd like to be able to watch HD video streams when available for minor league games via MiLB.TV.

Acceptance Criteria:
When HD video streams are supported in the First Pitch Android app.
